topic.title: Number of Live Births Now Dead - conformance rules

lines.i: The total number of previous live-born infants now dead. For multiple deliveries include all live-born infants before this infant in the pregnancy who are now dead. If the first born, do not include this infant.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.38"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:215)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:217)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:216)/@code="68496-9" Live births now dead (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records the total number of previous live-born infants now dead.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:218)
The total number of previous live-born infants now dead. The entry is a non-negative integer within the range from zero to 30.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:215)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:217)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:216)/@code="68496-9" Live births now dead (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records the total number of previous live-born infants now dead.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:218)
The total number of previous live-born infants now dead. The entry is a non-negative integer within the range from zero to 30.

p.ph: Number of Live Births Now Dead
